titleStmt.title: Orders taken & enacted, for orphans and their portions. Anno M D. LXXX.
Acts and orders. 1580
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Running title reads: Orders enacted for orphanes.
Some print show-through; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
